items.content: Through the development of technology Communication design evolved to a versatile and ecletic discipline. Nowadays classical print products existing next to digital platfroms and applications. Being aware of the new and challenging possibilites in the digital age I focused my interest on Interactive Information design with the ambition to create conceptional experiences in digital environments.

During my Master I focused my research on the historical development of media technology. Researching the kind of ways we deliver information and how we expanded our original cognitive abilities with technological inventions.
